summary: This is an email exchange between two individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding the filed version of Epstein-related legal papers. The sender attaches the publicly filed versions and offers to provide an unredacted version upon request.

persons.name: Deputy United States Attorney
persons.context: The recipient of the initial email request, identified by their title at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, asking for the filed Epstein papers.

events.title: Filing of Epstein legal papers
events.description: Legal papers related to the Epstein case were filed, referenced in the email attachments.

locations: United States Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The email exchange is between individuals at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding Epstein case documents.
The sender attaches the publicly filed versions of Epstein papers from July 16, 2019.
The sender offers to provide an unredacted version of the submission upon request, indicating the existence of both public and non-public versions of the documents.
